definition: emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain
to cheat/to swindle/to pretend/to feign/to draw sb out/to try to extract information by deceit or bluff

sentences.english: My mouth shall meditate truth, and my lips shall hate wickedness.
sentences.chinese: 的確，我的口只暢談真理，我厭惡虛詐的脣舌。
